ac: 28, touch 13, flat-footed 25 (+8 armor, +3 Dex, +5 natural, +2 shield)
speed: 40 ft. (30 ft. in armor), climb 15 ft.
languages: Abyssal, Celestial, Infernal; speak with animals (including vermin), tongues

spells.spell-like abilities:
(CL 12th; concentration +15)

At will-detect undead, stone tell

5/day-speak with dead

3/day-summon (level 7, 1d4 giant tarantulas [Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 2 256] 75% or 1d4 spider swarms 100%)

spells.inquisitor spells known:
(CL 12th; concentration +15)

4th (3/day)-cure critical wounds, divination, freedom of movement, spell immunity

3rd (5/day)-blood biography (DC 16), dimensional anchor, dispel magic, halt undead (DC 16)

2nd (6/day)-confess (DC 15), detect thoughts (DC 15), hold person (DC 15), invisibility, see invisibility

1st (6/day)-bane (DC 14), command (DC 14), comprehend languages, expeditious retreat, sanctuary (DC 14), wrath

0-bleed (DC 13), detect magic, disrupt undead, read magic, sift, stabilize

feats: Alertness, Combat Expertise, Combat Reflexes, Deflect ArrowsB, Eschew MaterialsB, Following Step, Improved Initiative, Iron Will, Persuasive, Step Up, Step Up and Strike
senses: darkvision 60 ft., low-light vision, spiritsense; Perception +28
description: This beautiful woman wears a mask and is completely wrapped in spider silk. Magical fetishes adorn her clothing and staff.

sections.body: A morrigna casts spells as a 12th-level inquisitor.
sections.name: Spells

sections.body: A morrigna can see through the eyes of a spider swarm she summons as though it were the sensor of an arcane eye spell. She does not have to concentrate to use this ability.
sections.name: Spider Sight

sections.body: A morrigna's web wrappings grant her a +2 shield bonus to AC and can make secondary natural attacks.
sections.name: Wrappings

sections.body: Morrignas are Purgatory's investigators, bounty hunters, and assassins, tracking down those who flout the natural cycle of death and judgment. They stand 7 to 8 feet tall and weigh 200 to 250 pounds.

Many morrignas prefer to assume the appearances of those who have died. They ensure the smooth operation of death's bureaucratic machine by eliminating complications, dedicating their existence to wiping out any forces that circumvent or corrupt the natural cycle of death and judgment.

special_qualities: change shape (any animal or humanoid), spirit touch
name: Psychopomp, Morrigna
skills: Bluff +15, Climb +11, Diplomacy +25, Disguise +15, Intimidate +17, Knowledge (planes) +13, Perception +28, Sense Motive +25, Sleight of Hand +10, Stealth +22, Survival +15, Swim +6
